query:
UPDATE iam.user
            SET
                deleted_at = statement_timestamp(),
                email = 'deleted-' || user__id::text || '@deleted.invalid',
                first_name = '',
                last_name = '',
                password = ''
            WHERE user__id = ANY($1)
                AND deletion_requested_at IS NOT NULL
                AND deleted_at IS NULL
                AND deletion_requested_at + $2 < statement_timestamp()
